text: Thomas Pashley was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==Career== Pashley joined Bradford City from Whitby Town in February 1905.Frost, p. 403 He made one league appearance for the club,Frost, p. 387 before being released later in 1905. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:Date of birth missing Category:Date of death missing Category:English footballers Category:Whitby Town F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Thomas Pashley
